document.full_text: nate schierholtz delivered a pair of key run-scoring blasts to rally the san francisco giants to a comeback 7-5 victory over the st. louis cardinals in 11 innings on wednesday.
document.title: schierholtz stands tall to lift giants over cardinals
lines_and_colors: nate schierholtz delivered a pair of key run-scoring blasts to rally the san francisco giants to a comeback 7-5 victory over the st. louis cardinals in 11 innings on wednesday.
